title: the Keen fan music topic
content:
Since there are more Keen fan songs than can be found, I decided (after discussion with KeenRush) that we are in need of a fan music topic.

If you made a fan song, or still have some unposted ones lying around, please post them here! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: the Keen fan music topic
content:
Yes, indeed, we need to hear all those cool Keen tunes!

Here are the three famous remixes from OCRemix:
[url=http://www.ocremix.org/quicksearch/game/?qs_query=commander+keen]www.ocremix.org/quicksear...ander+keen[/url]
They're excellent, I suggest listening to them if you haven't heard them before! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

I'd like to find the remix of some Keen 6 track someone made a few years ago. Was it you Xky? It was pretty decent sounding and in mp3 format if I remember correct. It was the factory tune, IIRK.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: the Keen fan music topic
content:
Hm. That might've been one of the resamplings I did, but I've long since lost all of those files.

I've got a handful of other remixes collected from here and there, if anyone really wants them. Nothing as good as the OCR works, though.

title: Re: the Keen fan music topic
content:
Hey, now that I think of it, it probably was you! Gaaarg, too bad to hear the files are lost! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: the Keen fan music topic
content:
Scizor, just upload and post any song that wasn't posted yet here. I'm sure that enough people are interested. Like me. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: the Keen fan music topic
content:
I already created a thread for this purpose called [url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumothercommanderkeenstuff.showMessage?topicID=1136.topic]Music Remixes[/url] back in 2005, and I pointed towards the stuff I knew of in there.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: the Keen fan music topic
content:
The problem with that topic being that VGMix has been down for quite a few months now.

EDIT: Angelfire makes Sciz sad. Read on below.

title: Re: the Keen fan music topic
content: The TMST one sounds quite similar to the StrifeToons music, and I hadn't heard some of those others before.  I still think the Neko/Dopefish one is my favourite.

title: re
content: Lets not forget my keen 5 remix

title: Re: re
content: Looks like Angelfire killed your site... send the files to grafix5000 at gmail dot com and I'll upload them for you.

title: Re: re
content:
"Lets not forget my keen 5 remix"
Indeed. I loved that mix, and requested an mp3 of it, but you didn't post it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

I remembered it when I talked with DaVince, but I forgot it when I replied in this topic. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: re
content: Sent. I guess Angelfire finally noticed that I haven't actually been using that space as a website for a few years now. Or they figured those were illegal or something. Heh.

title: Re: re
content: That Keen music collection reuploaded for your entertainment: [url=http://rewound.net/~grafix/keenmusic.rar]rewound.net/~grafix/keenmusic.rar[/url]. Enjoy!

title: Re: re
content:

content:

All in all however that is some very nice music, worth of a playstation game or something.

title: Re: re
content:
I'm sorry to say I don't really like those, ZidaneA. The samples aren't too good, sometimes even annoying, and there's a lot of empty space you could fill up.

But it's nice to know that there's more Keen fanmusic out there than you'd think. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

content: They're not too bad.  Again they're more like the original songs with different instruments rather than proper remixes, but they're still pretty good.
